title: SleepWise – Study & Sleep Planner
goal: Auto-build weekly study plans that respect sleep preferences.
why_it_matters: Sleep deprivation directly lowers grades; scheduling rest improves retention.
data: Study hours, preferred sleep windows, task list, deadlines.
ai: Rule engine for optimal slot allocation.
workflow: User inputs sleep hours and available time.
Detects over-commitment and suggests rest slots.
Outputs visual timetable and optional ICS calendar.
outcome: Demonstrates constraint solving and human-centered productivity design.
